      • paint

        void paint(java.awt.Shape shape,
         java.awt.Graphics2D g,
         java.awt.Paint paint,
         MapItemState state)
        Defines how to paint out the passed shape on the passed graphics context.
        Parameters:
        shape - The shape to paint.
        g - The graphics context to paint onto.
        paint - The paint object to use when painting.
        state - The current state of the shape to render.

      • paintChanged

        boolean paintChanged(MapItemState previousState,
                   MapItemState nextState)
        Indicates if the paint method is changed between the two states.
        Parameters:
        previousState -
        nextState -
        Returns:
        True if the paint needs to be changed between the two states, false otherwise.

      • getDrawnShape

        java.awt.Shape getDrawnShape(java.awt.Shape shape,
                           MapItemState state)
        Obtains the shape to draw, given a state and the original shape. Used to determine bounds of drawn shape.
        Parameters:
        shape - The shape to examine.
        state - The bounding box for the shape.
        Returns:
        The complete shape to draw.
